TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChannelDispatcher extends System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase

summary.span: 元件，它會接受通道且使通道與服務產生關聯。

span.span: A component that accepts channels and associates them with a service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會透過服務執行個體，與位於特定 URI (稱為接聽 URI) 的 產生關聯。A object associates an at a particular URI (called a listen URI) with an instance of a service. 每個 物件都可以擁有許多 物件，而其中每一個物件都會與該服務的不同接聽程式 (Listener) 和接聽 URI 具有關聯。Each object can have many objects, each associated with a different listener and listen URI for that service. 當訊息抵達時， 會查詢每個關聯的 物件來判定該端點是否可以接受此訊息，然後將該訊息傳遞至可以接受的端點。When a message arrives, the queries each of the associated objects whether the endpoint can accept the message, and passes the message to the one that can. 當訊息的目的端位址與 屬性相符，且訊息動作符合 屬性時， 物件就會負責處理來自 的訊息。The object is responsible for processing messages from a when the destination address of a message matches the property and the message action matches the property. 所有控制通道工作階段之存留期及行為的屬性都可以用來檢查或修改 物件，All properties that control the lifetime and behavior of a channel session are available for inspection or modification on the object. 除了 之外，這些還包括自訂 物件、、、目前相關聯的物件和 。In addition to the , these include custom objects, the , the , the associated and . ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/cs/service.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/vb/service.vb#0)]

summary.span: 取得 物件集合，在通道第一次建立時，您可以使用這些物件來檢查和加入通道狀態。

span.span: Gets a set of objects that you can use to inspect and add state to channels when they are first created.

value.span: ，型別為 物件。

span.span: A of type objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性，即可將自訂通道初始設定式插入至初始設定集合 (Initialization Collection)，以便在通道建立時檢查或修改通道狀態。Use this property to insert a custom channel initializer into the initialization collection to inspect or modify channel state when they are created. 如果與發送器關聯的合約是雙工合約，這個屬性也可以用來對傳出通道執行相同的行為。This is also useful to perform the same behavior on outgoing channels if the contract associated with a dispatcher is a duplex contract. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/cs/snippets.cs#5)] [!code-vb[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/vb/snippets.vb#5)]

value.span: 如果 Proxy 不會加入任何定址標頭，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在 的執行個體處於 狀態時才可以設定這個屬性，因為這是唯一同時處於可變動且尚未處置的狀態。This property can only be set when the instance of the is in the state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed. 如果您不要讓用戶端將訊息識別碼 (Message ID) 和回覆 (ReplyTo) 等定址標頭加入至要求/回覆訊息，以便應用程式可以控制這些標頭，請將 屬性設定為 `true`。Set the property to `true` if you want to prevent the client from adding Message ID and ReplyTo addressing headers to request/response messages so that your application can control these headers. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/cs/snippets.cs#12)] [!code-vb[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/vb/snippets.vb#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果繫結實作，Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 的值指派給這個屬性的屬性。If a binding implements , Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) assigns the value of the property to this property. 因此，如果這個值為 `true`，就會覆寫 `false` 的 預設值。So if this value is `true`, the `false` default value of is overridden. 只有在 的執行個體處於 狀態時才可以設定這個屬性，因為這是唯一同時處於可變動且尚未處置的狀態。This property can only be set when the instance of the is in the state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/cs/snippets.cs#14)] [!code-vb[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/vb/snippets.vb#14)]
